Name: Jean Lafitte Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Not dissimilar to spicy, fortified advocaat. Yumm!
History: Our adaptation of the New Orleans classic named after the infamous privateer and hero of the Battle of New Orleans.
